text: Jonny and Steph ( Picture : Rex ) Stephanie Pratt has claimed that ex - boyfriend Jonny Mitchell cheated on her, attempted to pay off those who wanted to tell Steph the true story, and later attacked her. Taking to Twitter on Thursday, Steph shared screengrabs of messages she received which claimed Jonny slept with two girls when he visited Exeter University to do club promotion, and a second screengrab of a picture of Jonny with a mystery woman. She also revealed that she called the police after he allegedly ‘ attacked ’ her. Now a close friend of Steph ’ s has told Metro. co. uk that friends of the reality star ‘ are really concerned ’ and that she is ‘ very upset ’ and ‘ is not talking to any friends ’.
